body:
My connection to Avicus went from this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hwWnTxYskNQ&list=UUiTAllfEvygiTybsZKdw6QQ
(215ms)
To this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QRQZiHbvR5Q&list=UUiTAllfEvygiTybsZKdw6QQ

Nothing has changed in regards to my internet in this time, anyone know why the hell this is?
EDIT: This has been going on for a month. Do not tell me about my router, it's not.

title: What, why, how the hell...?

replies.body: Sometimes the server's latency fluctuates. Therefore suggesting server-side lag.
replies.body_tagged: Sometimes the server's latency fluctuates. Therefore suggesting server-side lag.

replies.body: No one else was lagging, and this has been going on for almost a month.
replies.body_tagged: No one else was lagging, and this has been going on for almost a month.

reply_to.body: Sometimes the server's latency fluctuates. Therefore suggesting server-side lag.
reply_to.body_tagged: Sometimes the server's latency fluctuates. Therefore suggesting server-side lag.

replies.body: The server is trying to work with the 1.8 update. Be patient and it will hopefully be fixed soon.

:P

replies.body: Unplug your router, wait 10 seconds, plug it back in and check your ping.  If this doesn't work, repeat with your modem.
replies.body_tagged: Unplug your router, wait 10 seconds, plug it back in and check your ping.  If this doesn't work, repeat with your modem.

replies.body: For real. It's been going on for one month. Not a one time occurrence. It only happens with Avicus. Please don't tell me it's my router or to use it to my advantage, because quite frankly it's not and I can't. Is there anything that has happened, like a host move I'm unaware of or something? I really want to know why the hell this is.
replies.body_tagged: For real. It's been going on for one month. Not a one time occurrence. It only happens with Avicus. Please don't tell me it's my router or to use it to my advantage, because quite frankly it's not and I can't. Is there anything that has happened, like a host move I'm unaware of or something? I really want to know why the hell this is.

replies.body: Avicus is still being hosted in the same location, how do you know nothing has gone wrong with your internet? Might be your ISP and bandwidth.
